title: Resident Event Lounge, Gated Community, GOFit Fitness Center
posting_body: ['Nestled in a majestic, lush, 42 acre North Georgia Forest environment, Bridgewater Apartments offers the best in Atlanta-area apartment living.', 'Conveniently located just minutes from I-85, Bridgewater offers a unique combination of rural beauty and urban convenience.', 'You’ll be a short drive into downtown Atlanta, giving you access to major business districts, everyday conveniences, and all of the shopping and entertainment you could want!', 'Our exceptional apartments and impressive amenities paired with our gracious team will surpass all of your expectations.', 'Enjoy the carefree lifestyle that you deserve!', 'Property Amenities:', 'GOFit Fitness Center', '2 Swimming Pools', 'GOChat Business Center', '64 Acres of Recreation & Nature Preserves', 'Pet Friendly', 'Sand Volleyball Court', 'Gated Community', 'Game Room with Billards Table', 'Resident Event Lounge', 'GOFetch Dog Park', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of your exact home.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!', 'Professionally managed by GoldOller Real Estate Investments, a provider of Fair Housing and Equal Opportunity.']
